name: upload-gear
label: Upload gear: upload files
description: This gear upload files to a specific acquisition of a specific project.
author: Yichao Deng

files.description: One zipfile(.zip) you want to upload. To upload multiple files, you can just add all of them into a zip file and upload there.

user_id.description: Please enter your user id to get access to the flywheel.

target_project.description: Please enter the path of the project you want to upload your files to.

subject_label.description: Please enter the label of the subject where your acquisition at.

session_label.description: Please enter the label of the session where your acquisition at.

acquisition_label.description: Please enter the label of the acquisition you want to put your files in.
